pullrequest.title: Slimmed down the Plugin pull request (no more template specializations)

content.raw:
That difference doesn't actually impact anything in this particular code.

The `=` versus `&` determines how variables from the lambda's parent scope that are used within the lambda will be "captured" by the lambda (by copy or by reference). The lambdas here aren't using any variables from their parent scope, so the "capture method" ends up being irrelevant.

I definitely think Shane is right that we can reduce the duplication, and I'm always in favor of DRYness.
content.html:
That difference doesn't actually impact anything in this particular code.

The = versus & determines how variables from the lambda's parent scope that are used within the lambda will be "captured" by the lambda (by copy or by reference). The lambdas here aren't using any variables from their parent scope, so the "capture method" ends up being irrelevant.

I definitely think Shane is right that we can reduce the duplication, and I'm always in favor of DRYness.
